com.google.android.exoplayer.text.ttml

Class TtmlSubtitle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.text.ttml.TtmlSubtitle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subtitle

    public final class TtmlSubtitle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subtitle
    A representation of a TTML subtitle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TtmlSubtitle(com.google.android.exoplayer.text.ttml.TtmlNode root, long startTimeUs) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getEventTime(int index)
      Gets the event time at a specified index.
      int getEventTimeCount()
      Gets the number of event times, where events are defined as points in time at which the text returned by Subtitle.getText(long) changes.
      long getLastEventTime()
      Convenience method for obtaining the last event time.
      int getNextEventTimeIndex(long timeUs)
      Gets the index of the first event that occurs after a given time (exclusive).
      long getStartTime()
      Gets the start time of the subtitle.
      java.lang.String getText(long timeUs)
      Retrieve the subtitle text that should be displayed at a given time.

    • Method Detail

      • getStartTime

        public long getStartTime()
        Description copied from interface: Subtitle
        Gets the start time of the subtitle.

        Note that the value returned may be less than getEventTime(0), since a subtitle may begin prior to the time of the first event.

        Specified by:
        getStartTime in interface Subtitle
        Returns:
        The start time of the subtitle in microseconds.

      • getNextEventTimeIndex

        public int getNextEventTimeIndex(long timeUs)
        Description copied from interface: Subtitle
        Gets the index of the first event that occurs after a given time (exclusive).
        Specified by:
        getNextEventTimeIndex in interface Subtitle
        Parameters:
        timeUs - The time in microseconds.
        Returns:
        The index of the next event, or -1 if there are no events after the specified time.

      • getEventTimeCount

        public int getEventTimeCount()
        Description copied from interface: Subtitle
        Gets the number of event times, where events are defined as points in time at which the text returned by Subtitle.getText(long) changes.
        Specified by:
        getEventTimeCount in interface Subtitle
        Returns:
        The number of event times.

      • getEventTime

        public long getEventTime(int index)
        Description copied from interface: Subtitle
        Gets the event time at a specified index.
        Specified by:
        getEventTime in interface Subtitle
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the event time to obtain.
        Returns:
        The event time in microseconds.

      • getLastEventTime

        public long getLastEventTime()
        Description copied from interface: Subtitle
        Convenience method for obtaining the last event time.
        Specified by:
        getLastEventTime in interface Subtitle
        Returns:
        The time of the last event in microseconds, or -1 if getEventTimeCount() == 0.

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText(long timeUs)
        Description copied from interface: Subtitle
        Retrieve the subtitle text that should be displayed at a given time.
        Specified by:
        getText in interface Subtitle
        Parameters:
        timeUs - The time in microseconds.
        Returns:
        The text that should be displayed, or null.
